articles.title: Ticketed fans kept out of Copa America final want refunds - NBC Miami
articles.description: Chaos at the gates of the Copa America final prevented some ticketholders from entering Hard Rock Stadium on Sunday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Messi loses fitness battle at Copa America, puts goal of playing 6th World Cup on hold - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Despite winning the title in one of his “last battles,” Messi did not pass the fitness test that could have opened the way for him to play his sixth World Cup. | Football News
articles.content:
Lionel Messi cried uncontrollably after he exited from a Copa America final before fulltime for the first time in his career.
